itemDescription: British swimmer, Olympic athlete, Commonwealth Games bronze medallist

wikipedia_page.main: Stanley Robert Clarke (born 31 July 1938) is an English former competition swimmer.

response: Stanley Clarke (born 1951) is an American jazz bassist and film composer.
Stanley Clarke may also refer to:
* Stanley Clarke (businessman) (1933–2004), English businessman, property developer, horse racing enthusiast, and philanthropist
